list.entry: On the 5th of October the Macedonian POP singer Tose Proeski held his last concert.So to symbolize this day The Republic of Macedonia is hosted a concert.Over 50'000 people attended the concert,there were also a lot of famous POP singers from all around the world.The concert was held at the "City Stadium" in Skopje.This concert has been rated as one of the biggest and best concerts in the world.All of the songs that Tose Proeski has ever written and sang were sang by the singers in attendance and the public.Over 50 million people said goodbye to the famous Tose Proeski.
